SELECT A.ANO, A.ATNO, A.ALARM_DATE , A.RECEIVE_MNO, M1.NICNAME RECEIVE_NICNAME, A.SEND_MNO , M2.NICNAME SEND_NICNAME, A.SEND_NMNO, N.NM_TITLE , A.SEND_BNO, B.B_TITLE, CASE WHEN LENGTH(B.B_CONTENT)>20 THEN SUBSTR(B.B_CONTENT,0,20)||'..' ELSE B.B_CONTENT END as B_CONTENT , A.STATUS FROM ALARM A LEFT JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(A.RECEIVE_MNO=M1.MNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(A.SEND_MNO=M2.MNO) LEFT JOIN NARUMARU N ON(A.SEND_NMNO=N.NMNO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(A.SEND_BNO=B.BNO) WHERE RECEIVE_MNO=#{mno} ORDER BY A.ANO DESC
